From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To display information about the terminal line of the current user, including host name, line number, line speed, and location, use the **show whoami** command in EXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: (Optional) Additional data to print to the screen.

Examples: The following example is sample output from the show whoami command:
Comm Server "Router", Line 0 at 0bps. Location "Second floor, West"
ExtraInfo: If text is included as an argument in the command, that text is displayed as part of the additional data about the line.To prevent the information from being lost if the menu display clears the screen, this command always displays a --More-- prompt before returning. Press the space bar to return to the prompt.
